titles.title: Protect the Gig Economy Act of 2021

To amend Rule 23 of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure to protect the "gig economy" and small businesses that operate in large part through contractor services from the threat of costly class action litigation, and for other purposes.
Protect the Gig Economy Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Protect the Gig Economy Act of 2021
This bill limits the certification of a class action lawsuit by prohibiting in such a lawsuit an allegation that employees were misclassified as independent contractors.
